definitions.definition: something that is typical of the group of things that it is a member of:
examples: Could you give me an example of the improvements you have mentioned?

definitions.definition: a way of helping someone to understand something by showing them how it is used:
examples: Study the examples first of all, then attempt the exercises on the next page.

definitions.definition: used when giving an example of the type of thing you mean:
examples: Offices can easily become more environmentally-friendly by, for example, using recycled paper.
